name: CalDigit TS4 Thunderbolt 4 Dock
image_prompt: CalDigit TS4 Thunderbolt 4 dock, silver aluminum enclosure, multiple ports visible, compact vertical design
description: Ultimate Thunderbolt 4 docking station with 18 ports including 2.5GbE, SD 4.0, and 98W charging. Supports dual 6K displays or single 8K, perfect for the most demanding setups.

reviews.review_text: The only dock that handles my triple monitor setup flawlessly.
98W charging means my MacBook Pro stays topped up all day.
Expensive but worth every penny. Zero issues in 6 months.
